Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Racine. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Racine.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Service Delayed at California
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at California due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at California due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
